{{Description|"Hmm? You'll pick this lamp, will you? Oh my, you've got good taste! Unfortunately, there's no price on this treasure &mdash; comparable, I'd say, to how you will not sell that mascot by your side for any price in the world."}}
'''Alcazarzaray's Exactitude''' is [[Dori]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Healing and Energy restoration effects occur every '''2''' seconds.
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|Connector DMG|character=Dori}}
* The Electro application to the active character can trigger certain on-hit effects, such as that of [[Beidou]]'s [[Stunning Revenge|4th Constellation Level]] and [[Thoma]]'s [[A Comrade's Duty|1st Constellation Level]].
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], the Jinni can connect to multiple characters.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Dori|talent=Alcazarzaray's Exactitude|ascension|1|An Eye for Gold|Decreases the cooldown of [[Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon]] by 1s after a character connected to the Jinni triggers an Elemental Reaction involving {{Electro}}. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Special Franchise}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Wonders Never Cease}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Discretionary Supplement|Buffs the character connected to the Jinni as follows:}}
** When their [[HP]] is lower than 50%, they gain 50% [[Incoming Healing Bonus]].
** When their [[Energy]] is less than 50%, they gain 30% [[Energy Recharge]].
